short_description: lurgan cu is a credit unions & savings institution based in craigavon, united kingdom.
long_description: we're a non-profit cooperative that shares its profits , rewards borrowers with low rates and provides free life savings, loan protection and funeral insurance. these prestigious awards celebrate and recognise social enterprise excellence in northern ireland. our all new app allows you to bank online - anytime. lcu app storys by lauren johnston. we recently donated to magheralin community association to help them celebrate 1500 years of magheralin village. steadily throughout the 1980's the levels of membership, loans issued and shares lodged increased. the loan book stands at £21 million. we're pleased to be promoting the credit union for the future and have nearly 4,000 junior accounts with almost £4 million saved. the credit union has started a new phase in delivering its services digitally. a new website and online loan applications were launched in early 2021. we continue to use our experience to promote the development of credit unions across the world. for many years, our members have helped some of the poorest people in the world to have access to their own credit union.

generated_description: lurgan cu, legally known as lurgan credit union limited, based in craigavon, northern ireland, is a non-profit community savings and loans cooperative established in 1963. the credit union serves over 27,000 members with savings and loans totaling £71 million and £21 million, respectively. lurgan credit union is known for its unique approach of sharing profits with its members, offering loan interest rebates and savings dividends. the credit union provides various financial services, including loan protection insurance, funeral assistance, and free life savings insurance. it has been recognized for its social impact and received the investors in people award in 2015.
